data.text: Luca Ferrari, Italian ambassador to China and Li Junhua, Chinese ambassador to Italy attended and addressed the event, praising the forward-looking and realistic significance of the conference.

Think Tank Cooperation Results Conference successfully held yesterday! #Eurispes and #CASS jointly organized experts to complete the research on carbon emission reduction in the civil aviation sector between China and Italy. #CEAir is happy to providing support for this research. https://t.co/kl4VJI5kcJ

🏖️Looking for a city with fine sandy beaches? #Qingdao should be listed! Here you’ll find Golden Beach, which is known as the biggest beach in China. With a gentle breeze rolling across the fine sand, #CEAir invites you to chill in this romantic place~ @loveqingdao @TouchShandong https://t.co/7uWIsmjBxd

data.text: Continue your travels around the world with #CEAir! This time, we will be heading to a diverse city. It’s not only a city by the sea, but also an international port city with a long history. Whatever your preference, this city will leave you satisfied. Guess where this is~ https://t.co/QOswcQh4UH
☀️The morning glow shines through the clouds. #CEAir is ready to take off! https://t.co/lLvElDY41H

✈️All set for Double 11! Eastern Air Logistics (EAL, a subsidiary of #CEAir) has increased our cargo flights to nearly 500 per week, sending good things from around the world to thousands of households. What did you order during this grand shopping festival season? Share with us. https://t.co/9r6jeO9uu1

🧑‍✈️Have you heard that the pilots of #CEAir have to take a series of examinations regularly? Why are Chinese flight standards the highest in the eyes of our Italian captain Diego? Click on the video below and learn why. https://t.co/tTg2yNqOCm

🍀It is a glamorous international event and a window into the world! In this beautiful autumn, we gather in the charming city of #Shanghai to explore the future together. Today is the last day of the 4th #CIIE. Let's review the best moments with #CEAir. @ciieonline https://t.co/rrAozeQFve

🍎Crossing the sea to see you! The imported French royal Gala apples for the 4th #CIIE were transported by #CEAir. Crisp and delicious, fresh and juicy ... We have done our best during transportation to preserve their best taste! #CIIE2021 @ciieonline https://t.co/i7kHK6bPeW

🍀#Shanghai is filled with the exciting atmosphere of the 4th #CIIE now! #CEAir is giving our all to ensure the smooth progress of the big event! 
▶️Take a look at how well we do in the Expo. @ciieonline https://t.co/jhKiujlT5P

urls.title: 24 Solar Terms: 8 things you may not know about Start of Winter[1]- Chinadaily.com.cn
urls.description: The traditional Chinese lunar calendar divides the year into 24 solar terms. Start of Winter, the 19th solar term of the year, begins this year on Nov 7 and ends on Nov 21.

data.text:
Want to learn more about Start of Winter? #24solarterms
Click here: https://t.co/zRaQNu74vU https://t.co/2k7oK9OFUB

🧣🧦Today is one of the #24solarterms, Start of Winter (Lidong). This is the first solar term of #winter, which means winter is coming and crops harvested in autumn should be stored up. To prepare for the oncoming cold winter, don’t forget to have some warm and nourishing food. https://t.co/MzX36xVfSc

data.text: 🍀Continue to share our “#CIIE Shopping Cart”! #CEAir signed procurement agreements for aviation equipment and services with Mallaghan Engineering @MALLAGHAN_GROUP, Collins Aerospace @CollinsAero, and Safran Landing System @SAFRAN on the first day of the 4th CIIE. @ciieonline https://t.co/nQEcN6bzsE

🍒At the 4th CIIE, #CEAir signed a cherry purchase agreement with Garces Fruit @garcesfruit! The cherries will “board” our #CIIE express, flying across the Atlantic Ocean, delivering the sweetness from #Chile 🇨🇱!
@ciieonline @ChinaEmbajada https://t.co/6ibVD19Syh

🍀Having seen our CIIE-themed plane, are you curious about what its cockpit looks like? Visit the MU@CIIE #VR Showroom then you will know! You can also go to our headquarters in #Shanghai! Click the link and start your virtual journey: https://t.co/RXy1E8RTGK @ciieonline https://t.co/4RwFqBOOLI

data.text: 🍀The 4th #CIIE officially kicked off today! Nearly 3,000 businesses from 127 countries and regions attended the 4th CIIE. Here you can see the coolest, the latest, and the most advanced. The excitement is ready, #CEAir invites you to join this global event! @ciieonline https://t.co/aoCAm19Fip

data.text: ✈️The North Bund International Aviation Forum in #Shanghai made a big success! It is a responsibility of every airline operator to promote the development of the industry, and bring the global economy back on track. Let's strive for a brighter future! #NorthBundForum @MeetBund https://t.co/GtF9Tqtlkv

Another result of this aviation forum is released! The global air transport industry launched an initiative of carbon reduction cooperation, to promote the sustainable development of the industry, and better play the connective role in global trade. #NorthBundForum #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/snbpszalMi

Here comes the most exciting part of this forum! After te heated discussion, the results of this forum are officially released, with the first being a standard system of the green airport construction, operation and maintenance. #NorthBundForum #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/4dy2fY9olt

A roundtable of the forum begins. Experts are going to discuss topics on "Reshaping the global supply chain and its challenges". #CEAir expects a more connected world as the logistics of the aviation industry reshapes! #NorthBundForum #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/67XhcwA1uR

The second topic of this forum is “The path to global outstanding city clusters – the construction and improvement path of world-class aviation hubs”. #CEAir believes the building of aviation hubs will make traveling more convenient for the people.  #NorthBundForum #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/e5nFRWmCTQ

data.text: Have you ever imagined the future of the aviation industry? Discussion on “Cooperation and win-win situation on carbon emission reduction in the international aviation industry during the pandemic” is underway. Join #CEAir and let’s fly toward a bluer sky! #NorthBundForum https://t.co/7lGTvDgpGc

annotations.normalized_text: China Eastern Air Holding Company Limited

data.text: Leaders of the organizers, including LIU Shaoyong, Chairman of China Eastern Air Holding Company Limited, and QIN Yun, Chairman of Shanghai Airport Authority delivered speeches, hoping to further advance the sustainable development of the industry. #NorthBundForum #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/1XFM8QnvKH

The “2021 North Bund International Aviation Forum,” aiming at promoting the communication and cooperation in the international aviation industry, has a rich agenda. Guests attending the event delivered speeches at the opening ceremony of it.  #NorthBundForum #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/7xP94AOloL

The Aviation Forum officially begins! What highlights will it bring us? How should the construction of the aviation industry be further advanced? How should the sustainable development of this industry be achieved? Please stay tuned for more at #CEAirOnAir！#NorthBundForum https://t.co/KMGatiYkwA

Opening TODAY! Focusing on the future development and reconstruction of the global aviation industry, the North Bund Aviation Forum has kicked off today. #CEAir, as one of the organizers of this forum, looks forward to sharing wisdom with experts at 13:00 (UTC+8)!#NorthBundForum https://t.co/nvgvLQFW2J

data.text: All set up for the 4th #CIIE ! It is expected that the #CEAir Lingyan flight attendant team will show the unique oriental charm to the world with high-quality services like etiquette volunteers during the fourth China International Import Expo! #CIIE2021 https://t.co/gJhTEcZLPc

To ensure the 4th #CIIE goes smoothly, #CEAir has launched new goods and services! A CIIE-themed page has been set up on our official website and APP to help visitors to participate in the Expo more conveniently, making every effort to improve their travel experience. @ciieonline https://t.co/k5ndo5A1Tx

data.text: 🗓️The first North Bund International Aviation Forum will open TOMORROW! #CEAir will be sharing the great moments on #Twitter throughout the forum. Want to learn more about aviation? Be sure to check them out by #CEAirOnAir tomorrow! #NorthBundForum @MeetBund https://t.co/WBXFnlPr4I

data.text: The last 2⃣ days before the opening of the first North Bund International Aviation Forum! Since the earlier preparing stage, #CEAir has given it our all to ensure everything at the forum goes smoothly. Stay tuned for the wonderful forum. #NorthBundForum @MeetBund https://t.co/bkMKQ7vHoK

To control the amount of non-recycled plastic use, #CEAir continues to adopt degradable food packaging on flights. Now, biodegradable drinking straws and plastic bags have been put into full use in part of CEAir’s VIP lounge and stores. #CEAirGoGreen https://t.co/9Hs0vmgfUT

data.text: 3⃣ DAYS TO GO! The first North Bund International Aviation Forum is about to start! As the primary organizer of the forum, #CEAir will gather with experts from the aviation industry to discuss the industry’s future developments in #Shanghai. #NorthBundForum @MeetBund https://t.co/uRgpipMvun

Aircraft dismantling is one key element to recycling end-of-life assets and getting the max value from them. CEAir obtained an aircraft dismantling permission this August, which means that we are now able to carry out the dismantling of #A320 series independently. #CEAirGoGreen https://t.co/QDpEbVNnE8

✈️💚“Greener Life, Greener Future” has been a long-term goal that #CEAir tries to achieve. CEAir will continue to adhere to the concept of “Greener Flights” and provide more eco-friendly choices for passengers. Let’s fly to a bright and green future together! #CEAirGoGreen https://t.co/mKWTeJ3cuf

5⃣ DAYS TO GO! 
✈️The 2021 #CIIE is about to start! #CEAir CIIE-themed plane has started its global flight journey after its debut, showing up in the blue sky, sending out a "CIIE Invitation" to the world. Let us know if you’ve received the special invitation from us. @ciieonline https://t.co/nYXYOmY1t9

Since 2016, #CEAir has made efforts to optimize the international routes from China to Oceania, Europe, America, etc., some of which have reduced flight times by 1 hour. While enabling passengers to reach their destination earlier, it also reduces fuel consumption. #CEAirGoGreen https://t.co/EozfOF7X6s

At present, CEAir’s special vehicles powered by clean energy have been put into use in many airports. They help effectively reduce pollution, successfully making #CEAir greener in the sky and greener on the ground.  #CEAirGoGreen https://t.co/u5eexEw6ie

✈️#CEAir B-2002 #CIIE-themed airplane has flown over 2200 hours!  This plane Jinbo carried out 634 flights and flew to more than 10 countries in the past year. Have you seen this special painted plane in your place? @ciieonline https://t.co/iYdY4IcMLU

On October 18, #CEAir carried the athletes of the 10th National Games for Persons with Disabilities from #Shanghai to #Xian. In order to facilitate communication for the hearing-impaired, CEAir prepared text cards in advance to provide a sweeter service. https://t.co/vMAgpClcL4

#CEAir launched a voluntary plastic-free service campaign recently. More than 30 employees and client representatives came to Fengxian Beach in #Shanghai to help clean up the ocean trash and a total of 70 kilograms of waste was cleaned. #CEAirGoGreen https://t.co/onWyTQ6cJy

urls.title: 24 Solar Terms: 8 things you may not know about Frost's Descent[1]- Chinadaily.com.cn
urls.description: The traditional Chinese Lunar calendar divides the year into 24 solar terms. Frost's Descent (Chinese: 霜降), the 18th solar term of the year, begins year on Oct 23 and ends on Nov 7.

data.text:
Want to learn more about Frost's Descent? #24solarterms
Click here: https://t.co/HmyjamOiyS https://t.co/z8fsGwC4dj

🍂Today is one of the #24solarterms, Frost's Descent (Shuangjiang). It is considered the last chapter of autumn and the prelude to the coming winter, during which time the weather becomes much colder than before, bringing frost and freezing winds. https://t.co/ZW8MjWiuaH

data.text: 💚#CEAir’s effort in energy conservation can be seen in every detail. Over the past five years, CEAir has reduced its carbon emissions by 2 million T with an annual average carbon reduction of 400 thousand T, saving more than 600 thousand T of fuel in total. #CEAirGoGreen https://t.co/W88wScRdjW

Air Traffic Controller is a great profession. Their microphone carries the responsibility to ensure the safety of every passenger, every instruction is highly rigorous. Want to know the daily conversations between a flight dispatcher and an ATC? Check it out in the video below https://t.co/UOXE1pG11e

There are a group of people, who map out strategies for maintaining order in the air, who make the sky safe and ensure we fly smoothly to our destinations. Today is #InternationalDayoftheAirTrafficController . Saluting all guardians of the sky, and thank you for your dedication! https://t.co/CIuo4tHRRL

💚Would you believe this little pad can help save 3 million dollars every year? Since June 10, #CEAir paperless cockpit project has been upgraded again. This is the first time that China's civil aviation has officially replaced paper flight record books with #ELB. #CEAirGoGreen https://t.co/kMHknOcFsS

🎉The only airline product of the “2021-2022 Global Airline Meal List-Best Airline Cultural and Creative Five-Star Award” is MU Tea! MU Tea meets the clouds in the sky, providing you a wonderful journey. Board the airplane and have a sip! #CEAir https://t.co/hCzVQrZjd0

data.text: 💚In 2020, #CEAir set up the Technology Incubation Laboratory where a kind of “eco-friendly cleaning” product was successfully researched and developed after several experiments. In March 2021, the product was successfully awarded the national utility model patent.  #CEAirGoGreen https://t.co/pXXVrBkowh

👐Today is #GlobalHandwashingDay! Washing hands with soap and water is one of the best steps we can take to avoid getting sick and spreading germs to others. Come and learn the "7 steps of handwashing" with #CEAir, and let’s keep our hands clean together. https://t.co/FnmTX0v6zX

data.text: 💡The first bar to the fourth bar on the pilot epaulettes means professionalism, knowledge, Skill and responsibility respectively. So the answer is “Professionalism”. Did you get it right?

Surely everyone has the dream of flying at least once in their life. Technology brings everything together and innovation unites time. May there always be love in your eyes and light in your heart. China Eastern Airlines, connecting all the wonders of the world. https://t.co/T5FX3aPHZ2

The Double Ninth Festival, or Chongyang Festival, is held on the ninth day of the ninth lunar month. It is also known as the Senior Citizens’ Festival in China, a festival to respect and care for the elderly. https://t.co/pJbQkp79Jm

☕️🍵Grinding coffee beans carefully, or making a cup of tea patiently...the faint aroma comes out only if you pay special attention when preparing it. Find a quiet place, #CEAir invites you to enjoy a relaxing afternoon tea time with a cup of mellow coffee or tea. https://t.co/7EKpqiegq2

data.text: 🎙️"Ladies and gentlemen, welcome onboard Flight MU5103, the first full life-cycle carbon-neutral flight. This flight will offset carbon emissions by supporting afforestation and other projects. #CEAir is honored to fly this special 💚GREEN💚 trip with you." https://t.co/3ZlsVARRJS

“康”(kang) means health in Chinese. Before each flight takes off, all of the crew members of #CEAir carefully prepare to ensure a safe and orderly arrival. Join our Italian employee Martina to write your wishes for health! #MyFavoriteChineseCharacter https://t.co/AvnhcgIAAZ

🧑‍✈️Have you ever noticed the pilots’ epaulettes on their shoulders? The bars have different meanings. 
❓Do you know what does the first bar mean?

From today to December 10, #CEAir will carry out 780 #carbonneutral flights on 13 domestic routes. Passengers can recognize the exclusive markings via our APP. "Eastern Miles" members can support this project using the new membership system and receive green electronic medals. https://t.co/jbJxgWelSP

✈️On October 12, #CEAir flight MU5103 successfully made its maiden flight as China's first full life-cycle carbon-neutral flight! The maiden flight achieved the offset of carbon emissions during the flight, and jointly completed “China’s first ship of #carbonneutral oil” project. https://t.co/BGtSyIK2Yg

🐘A UN biodiversity conference #COP15 takes place this week in #Kunming. As the largest base airline in Kunming, #CEAir provides full service for this conference. CEAir tries to create a safe and orderly refined service environment, to show the charm of the #Yunnan to the world. https://t.co/UazDPh4kat

Colorful stage costumes and distinctive singing styles make Chinese opera attractive. After undergoing an elaborate make-up process, one of #CEAir flight attendants was beautifully transformed into an opera character and debuted on stage, telling a story with her performance. https://t.co/ndyyEZ9us3

data.text: “丰”（feng）means abundance. In recent years, #CEAir has studied passenger travel habits based on big data analysis. We focus on enriching travel scenes and travel plans. Try to write the interesting-looking character with our Chinese flight attendant Yihui Feng! https://t.co/fqHAKsOCIl

urls.title: 24 Solar Terms: 8 things you may not know about Cold Dew[1]- Chinadaily.com.cn
urls.description: Cold Dew, the 17th solar term of the year, begins this year on Oct 8 and ends on Oct 23.At this time, temperatures are much lower and the dew is greater and colder and there will be less rain.

data.text:
Want to learn more about Cold Dew? #24solarterms
Click here: https://t.co/nmQuNTcdMp https://t.co/qirFy4Ujrb

Today is one of the #24solarterms, Cold Dew (Hanlu). Sharing a #trivia: The season for fishing usually comes after Cold Dew because temperatures decrease quickly and sunshine cannot reach the deepwater. Fish swim to shallow water areas where the temperature is relatively high~ https://t.co/tqKKvEGnU4

data.text: From Hangzhou to France. From a layman of pottery to a unique potter. Because of a flight, Potter Jiang entered the world of traditional Chinese ceramics and opened a new door to her future. Check out the video and learn about her story. https://t.co/P8cARYvXQp
We are pleased to host the meeting and welcome our industry colleagues from around the world to #CEAir’s home city of #Shanghai . See you in 2⃣0⃣2⃣2⃣. #IATAAGM https://t.co/pl6ZVxYdsv

#CEAir will host the 78th #IATA Annual General Meeting #IATAAGM in #Shanghai in June, 2022. We are looking forward to meeting aviators from around the world. Let’s take this chance of gathering to communicate and discuss about future development of the industry. @IATA https://t.co/IMqAhNZFfX

data.text: Wisdom has no boundary, knowledge is infinite. Thank you for leading us to becoming a more open-minded and virtuous version of ourselves. Happy #WorldTeachersDay! https://t.co/rhemZjGbv3

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text: “悦”(yue) means joy in Chinese. Connecting all the wonders of the world, CEAir expects to share the joy of every encounter with you. Come and feel the joy of writing Chinese characters with our Korean flight attendant Kim Sohui together~ #MyFavoriteChineseCharacter https://t.co/uFOd9Rifhx

#CEAir set up an independent booth with the theme of "Greener Flights" at the 13th China International Aviation & Aerospace Exhibition. Combining the concept of technology and the future, it showed the corporate image of advancing with the times. @ExploreZhuhai #zhuhaiairshow2021 https://t.co/vlaeSv8MCQ

data.text: “乐” (yue) usually means music in Chinese. #CEAir crew staged a music-themed flashmob during the Spring Festival travel rush in Wuhan last year, giving all passengers a warm welcome to the city! Today is #InternationalMusicDay, try to write this character with Yumiko~ https://t.co/Vi8EcyU0ZE

data.text: The character “乐” (yue) refers to musical instruments in Chinese. #CEAir provides consignment services, so you can travel with your beloved musical instruments! Join German flight attendant Helena to write down the simplified Chinese character for“乐”~ #InternationalMusicDay https://t.co/LHHEzn1VAj

data.text: After traveling for more than 10,000 kilometers, Designer Zhang Lei changed his life and found his true purpose in life. He returned to his hometown #Hangzhou, explored the ancient Chinese oil-paper umbrella craft, and explored the future of traditional culture. https://t.co/38FWZFyTY5

“暖” (Nuan) means warmth and usually implies a pleasant feeling. #CEAir provides every passenger a warm-hearted and quality service all the time. Join our French stewardess Lucine as she uses a brush to write out the character, capturing what is sure to be a warm moment~ https://t.co/WGoJJQwY6K

🏐#CEAir flew with the Chinese Women’s National Volleyball Team during the epidemic and provided excellent services for the girls. In May 2⃣0⃣2⃣1⃣, the team took our #Shanghai -#Rome flight to participate in the World Women's Volleyball League held in #Italy. #CEAirMoments https://t.co/60MnT35uLi

data.text: “行”(xing) usually means "to move forward" or "it can be done" in Chinese. #CEAir insists on staying true to our service and keeps promoting the development of the civil aviation industry. Follow our Italian captain Diego and his son Markus, and try to write this character~ https://t.co/0pIewyC43f

What do you look forward to the most when you travel by air? #CEAir guesses many people may choose the moment when flight attendants send out in-flight meals!
🍎🫓🥨🌭🍕🍤🍜🍱🍨☕️🍵🍹
Finish the sentence: my favorite meal on a flight is...

data.text: In Chinese, the character “进”(Jin) implies progress. #CEAir is vigorously promoting energy-saving and emission-reduction projects, constantly "advancing" towards greener flights. Join our Spanish flight attendant Silvia, and write a note of encouragement down for yourself! https://t.co/lIh27u2ks5

🤜🤛Together we stand, my armors thine. On March 12, 2⃣0⃣2⃣0⃣, a charter flight of #CEAir escorted medical experts and delivered anti-epidemic supplies to #Italy along our #Shanghai -#Rome direct airroute. Sharing weal and woe, let’s meet again after the epidemic. #CEAirMoments https://t.co/oj8GAhJgcH

annotations.normalized_text: China Eastern Airlines New Loyalty Programme

data.text: ✈️The "New Value, New Experience, New Pleasure-China Eastern Airlines New Loyalty Programme" press conference was successfully held at the #ShanghaiTower. Thank you for motivating us. We would like to invite you, our dear friends, to get onboard and fly with #CEAir. https://t.co/s0kgnmFXPm

✈️China Eastern Airlines collaborates with global strategic partners to build the new FFP. In 2021, let’s move forward hand in hand, open a new chapter in travel, and experience a new service. Wherever you go, CEAir will accompany you. https://t.co/bEFoX4zu0m

data.text: “复”（Fu） means “recovery” in Chinese. Meeting the challenges of the global pandemic, #CEAir hopes everything can get better and recover soon. Let’s write the character with our Japanese flight attendant Otoshige Akane. #MyFavoriteChineseCharacter https://t.co/qiMFrbkZ4c

data.text: 👩‍✈️Giada, an Italian flight attendant of #CEAir, serves on the #Shanghai -#Rome direct air route. On 2⃣0⃣1⃣9⃣, she was the guide for the Beijing Daxing Airport when it was first put into operation and showed the smart facilities and sweet services to our passengers. #CEAirMoments https://t.co/oX6f2QHudu

data.text: ✈️Today is #WorldTourismDay. Don’t forget to take a break from your busy life and travel around the world！Leave a comment and share with #CEAir the place you want to go to the most!

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
Dear Esteemed Eastern Miles Members,
Thank you for attending today’s press conference. We look forward to creating the new value brought by the New Loyalty Programme. Connecting all the wonders of the world, China Eastern Airlines will always be your accompanist! #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/UfghRTXfrx

#CEAir is answering questions for you! After the press conference, we are accepting media interviews to answer questions that our passengers and netizens are concerned about. Any more details you want to know about? Leave your questions in the comment section below. #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/mFQTTzXT6r

Lit up! #CEAir’s New Loyalty Program is launched! We look forward to meeting you onboard and we wish every passenger can feel the beauty of flight because of us. Connecting all the wonders of the world, China Eastern Airlines will always be your accompanist! #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/EHe4ryyWrj

Under the New Loyalty Program model, no matter you take #CEAir flights, or use the points to redeem a ticket🎟️, a bowl of noodles🍜 or a cup of coffee☕️, your points account will always be available on a rolling basis without worrying about the expiration. #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/PqWN9O4hf9

data.text: Here comes China Eastern Airlines New Loyalty Program! The program has successfully transformed from a mileage-based model to a revenue-based model.What would you like to redeem your points for? Tell #CEAir in the comment section below! #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/lhGNVoW2M2

“We strive to better meet passengers’ anticipation,” said Mr. Feng Dehua, executive vice president of #CEAir at the New Loyalty Programme Press Conference. CEAir will keep working in Internet-based construction and intelligent hard-core technology applications. #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/od9kB7EYFD

data.text: ✈️The“China Eastern Airlines New Loyalty Programme" press conference is going on at the #ShanghaiTower ! #CEAir welcomes friends around the world to witness this important moment with us. #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/gNxJrjgdwh

The "New Value, New Experience, New Pleasure-China Eastern Airlines New Loyalty Programme" press conference will open soon! #CEAir will provide our dear passengers with sweeter and smarter services by upgrading our member services. Check out what’s new with us! #CEAirOnAir https://t.co/HYy4CwE6QG
